name: Looking Glass (itch) (LiauJ)
description:
Use your looking glass to solve the mysteries of this top-down puzzle game!

Created in 7 days for the Brackeys Game Jam 2022.1

The theme for the jam: It is not real

Controls:

  • WASD to move
  • E/Spacebar to interact with levers
  • Mouse over game objects to see if they're real or an illusion

GitHub: https://github.com/JeremyLiau/Looking-Glass

Music credits: Peace - lofi geek (https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCyD59CI7beJDU493glZpxgA)
